description: JSON schema for ThreadScript configuration files.

metadata.description: Metadata required to generate buildinfo files.

url.description: A unique URL to associate the project with

description.description: A short description about this project.

version.description: Version of this project's source code.

files.description: Configure the files of this project.

sourceDir.description: Directory where the source code of the project lives.

buildDir.description: Directory where the compiled output should go.

include.description: Specifies the files that should be compiled.

exclude.description: Specifies the files that should not be compiled.

compilerInfo.description: Defines the behaviour of the ThreadScript compiler.

outputTarget.description: Set the target of the output emitted by the compiler.
